name: Football Touches Tap Tap Ball!
description:
Are you ready for an addictive and challenging game? ‘Tap Tap Ball’ brings you hours of fun!
Simple controls, you can play anywhere you want.

Challenge your friends and see who get the highest score. The more you practice, the better you will become!

4 challenges to complete: 25, 50, 100 and 200 ball touches... can you achieve them?

It is very hard and challenging at the beginning, but you will become better very fast!

GAME FEATURES:

- Tap on the ball to make touches, like if it was football / soccer touches.

- Control the ball so that it doesn’t leave the screen or touches the floor.

- Control it by pressing in each side of the ball so that it moves on the other direction.

- Avoid obstacles! Try not to lose control when obstacles hit the ball.

- Infinite levels!

- Each level has a new color theme. Beautiful! The color switch will amaze you.

- Very addictive, you won’t stop playing.

- Challenge your friends and see who gets the highest score…

- Completely free!


If you are looking for a 'football touches' game, or an addictive, fun, free game to play anywhere, download 'Tap Tap Ball' now!

If you enjoy ‘Tap Tap Ball’ or you want to leave us feedback, you can do so at “contact@laifgames.com” or rate the game. We would like to hear from you.

Have fun!
